item.description: Cat tracking with Amazon Web Servicesâ€” AWS IoT, DynamoDB and SageMaker If you read 1 Cat, 3 Clouds â€” Where is Snowy sleeping (Part 1) youâ€™ll know Iâ€™m trying to build a real-time location tracker for my cat. Following on from that initial blog (which described the hardware and networking), this â€œPart 2â€ article describes data processing with Amazon Web Services. Iâ€™ll be using native AWS services for data ingest, data processing and mapping visualisation to build a low cost pet tracking device to show Snowyâ€™s location in real-time.
